Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the visa officer deny the applicant procedural fairness by requiring UK tax documents?

Crimes.Outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed; no certification of serious question

Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Denial of application due to non-compliance

Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA - requirement to provide all relevant documents

Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Request for additional documentation and response time
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide requested tax records
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Potential non-compliance with foreign tax laws

Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Officer considered lack of documentation as basis for concern
